amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the National Weather Service by $20.5 million and reduces funding for the polar convergent satellite program by an equal amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for NOAA's Operations and Research account by $20.5 million and is intended to target funding toward local warnings and forecasts. The amendment also provides for offsetting reductions in other accounts in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wamp amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
